reviewText: My uncle,  benji was in this movie.  I loved it

If you aren't familiar with all things Catholic, this movie probably won't work for you.  I attended Catholic schools at a time when Kennedy was elected, nuns looked like nuns and everyone knew what scapulars were.  To me, Impure Thoughts is the story of my elementary school.  I am confident the writers are Catholic school alumni.
Impure Thoughts This was recommended to me by a friend. I found it to be slow, boring and stupid.

i saw this film years ago at the settle film festival and enjoyed it very much then and was disapointed that it was apparently not widely released. i found it to be warm and somewhat amusing (not being raised a catholic)
